snippet: Lumber Liquidators reported a second-quarter loss as its struggles over imported Chinese-made products persist.
abstract: Lumber Liquidators reports second-quarter loss of $20.3 million, or 75 cents a share, compared with profit of $16.6 million, or 60 cents a share, in year-ago quarter.
lead_paragraph: Lumber Liquidators reported a second-quarter loss as its struggles over imported Chinese-made products persist.

headline.main: Lumber Liquidators Reports Loss After Chinese Flooring Report
headline.print_headline: Loss at Lumber Liquidators After Chinese Flooring Report
